SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.config

Class DovecotConfig.SaveLda

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.config.DovecotConfig.SaveLda
Enclosing class:
DovecotConfig
public static class DovecotConfig.SaveLda extends Object
LDA backend configuration.

Holds configuration for LDA-based mailbox delivery. LDA requires Robin and Dovecot in the same container or host, and uses UNIX sockets and the LDA binary for delivery.

      Returns:

    • getMaxConcurrency

      public int getMaxConcurrency()
      Gets maximum concurrent LDA subprocess limit.
      Returns:
      Maximum concurrent LDA processes (default: 50).

    • getLdaTimeoutSeconds

      public long getLdaTimeoutSeconds()
      Gets timeout in seconds for LDA subprocess execution.

      LDA processes are killed if they exceed this timeout.

      Returns:
      Timeout in seconds (default: 30).
